moves.1. e4 e6 2. d4 d5: the French opening: always hated that; I have tried e4-e5, with switching luck: nowadays, I just accept the gambit...
moves.8... Nbd7: looks like winning an easy pawn for Black: but White has some suprises in store...
moves.9. Bh5: complicating matters: Blacks' King is suddenly very unsafe...
moves.15... Qd5: still dizzy from the blow, Black puts his Queen 'en prise'; we are always a gentleman, so we let this slip by: we have a piece to capture...
moves.16. Qxh5 Be6: not sure, what is happening here: capitulation?

gameName: Fierce Queen is baffled by stupidity...
